lines.text: Why is it that the man who begs for mercy never gives it?
I work hard, every day of my life, just stayin' alive.
Shoot to kill. Wounds don't impress them. They've all been shot before.
You're going to have a choice. Them or me.
Go on in there, Red... we hear a shot, we'll know you bought the farm.
It ain't never too late, unless you're dead.
